pros: Colors and design match the PS4 aesthetic

customer_reviews.title: Great drive!!!

customer_reviews.text: Couldn't be more satisfied with this game drive! It was delivered quickly and installed effortlessly. Literally just plug in, format, and start downloading. Games play smooth with no excess loading time and with 4tb I have 43 games downloaded with less than 2tb used! I would highly recommend to anyone, not just avid gamers!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Westover

customer_reviews.title: Great additional storage very reliable
customer_reviews.text: Great additional storage, works extremely well just plug and play, have over 30 games on this one I use it on an Xbox one, use it everyday and it’s running 24/7 because I don’t disconnect my console (for some reason even if the console is off the HDD keeps running) loading times are a bit better than the internal HDD from XBOX
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great HDD. Ive had it for 7 months and its still going strong. No slowdown, long load times, nothing. I still recommend being very careful with it, during use.
customer_reviews.author: FirePistol

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WITH PS4
customer_reviews.text: Works flawlessly with the playstation 4 original and the ps4 pro. I've had no problem with data corruption and I was able to transfer all my games over to this device. The one thing I would warn people about is when you leave your ps4 on rest mode, and something happens where power is disconnected, then when starting up, the database has to rebuild itself and it seems like maybe thats how the data can be corrupted so I would try to stay away from leaving your ps4 on rest mode during a storm or something.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Works great for all my hi resolution music!
customer_reviews.text: I have mostly DSD high resolution music and FLAC and this stores them with ease and can run them off the drive anytime I want to listen and its nice and small so doesnt take a ton of room on my desk and no extra power brick is needed. The file system is EXfat if anyone is wondering which works well for reliability. great drive and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No security but it's fast
customer_reviews.text: This is a type of drive designed for video games and I found it to be faster than a previous WD drive. The only downside (not really) is that it doesn't allow you to password protect the drive. It works well though and I'd gladly trade the security for the speed.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and reliable on Xbox One X
customer_reviews.text: Got this as the deal of the day and it works perfectly with my Xbox One X. I put all of my games on it and kept the apps on the Xbox internal storage. Have enough room now to put every game I own on it with tons more room for the future. Never redownload a game again! Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Surreal Light

customer_reviews.title: So. Much. Room!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! My consoles seem to enjoy dying on me, and taking all my story progress with them. I finally bought one of these and started using it. What a life saver! My PS4 is very fragile to power outages which seems to happen a lot where I live. This hard drive has saved my progress dozens of times!
customer_reviews.author: Jules.

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost for Medium Speeds
customer_reviews.text: I've become spoiled by SSD speeds as of late, but I needed some cheap, portable storage for a new project. These have been working great so far. Of course, I wish they were faster, but for the price, they're certainly fast enough.
customer_reviews.author: Taz Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I recently received my drive and thus far it is working like a charm. In terms of long term use we will just have to wait and see. When it comes to setting it up it is extremely simple (borderline effortless honestly). I have no complaints about the drive so far and would def recommend getting yourself one if you are running low on your current storage.
customer_reviews.author: DaGoat Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Great value for name brand storage!
customer_reviews.text: This was just what I needed. I've been juggling games on my 500g Day One Xbox One for years now. With this I was able to install all my games with room for more. It was simple to use. Just plugged it in & turned on the Xbox. It formatted then asked to make it the primary storage. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: I-Reviewed-What

customer_reviews.title: Good so far. Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 500G PS4 with alot of games that I can't upload until I did my research and found this 2TB for Sony PS4 and bought it and now I have so much storage and can now download every game without having to delete other games. So far working great. Been 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Working fine for 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Not the fastest but its average performance and cool running makes this a great device. Reliability is the most important factor and there has been no problems with it at all. It also looks great. Using it for backup and not with a PS4. No formatting or anything else required and worked right out of the box..
customer_reviews.author: Joe Peter

customer_reviews.title: Holds games but has a major flaw!
customer_reviews.text: The product has the storage it said when I bought and holds stuff nicely EXCEPT it randomly tells us that it was disconnected improperly and needs to be repaired CONSTANTLY even when no one is touching it. I’m really hoping I didn’t waste this much money on a hard drive that is going to crap out on us. I changed the cord so hopefully that will solve this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Christyn Dye

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It does what I need it to do now I can move all the big games on my son ps4 to the external harddrive and keep small things on the main harddrive so he won't run out of space like he did before and I won't have to keep deleting games he can play all his games and that makes me a happy mommy thanks
customer_reviews.author: Lady Jerzy

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband since we ran out of space in our PS4 due to large games like Red Dead and Call of Duty. GREAT investment so we can continue to save our games! I also got it on cyber Monday so I saved like $20-$30! Definitely worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: HalesComet

customer_reviews.title: Western Digital is the Best
customer_reviews.text: WD has quickly become the only brand I trust when it comes to storage solutions. I bought this device for my daughter to use with her PS4, I have another WD device for my Xbox One X. Both were extremely easy to setup and neither have had any issues. Not only is WD often the less expensive option, it is simply more reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Haggard Gamer

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I each have a PS4. We can only fit a few games on the console's memory. It was becoming aggravating to have to delete games to put new ones on. We love this external memory. It has so much space for games and was super easy to install. Wish we would have gotten this sooner. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D. Martell

customer_reviews.title: So small
customer_reviews.text: The size of memory is amazing these days. i plugged it into the Xbox One S. It immediately recognized it and allowed formatting. i installed a game and was good to go. in reading the manual, it says you can unplug the drive and plug it in another Xbox to bring your game. I haven't tried that yet, but it sounds pretty cool.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Was supposed to receive it Monday, ended up waiting until Wednesday
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my xbox one s and its working perfectly, I had 1gb of free data left on my xbox but when I plugged it in and formatted it ( plug it in after it turns on, I plugged it in before the xbox turned on and it didnt detect it ) it says 1.8 tb, it should be 2 tb but I guess this fine, its close enough, overall I love it, I'll review it in a year from now and see how it is then.
customer_reviews.author: lowprices4you

customer_reviews.title: Initially great, then disaster
customer_reviews.text: Initially, it was great. Plugged it in and the PlayStation auto formatted it to work. Downloaded and transferred items to it, all was well. Then tonight I went to turn on my PlayStation and my tv kept flashing and losing input, unable to see anything from the PS4. I had sound but that was it. I turned off my PlayStation, unplugged the drive, turned it back on and I had video. But of course it wasn’t disconnected properly and required repair before the drive could be used. Hopefully this was a one time incident but essentially, having the drive plugged in rendered my PS4 completely uselessly for a moment
customer_reviews.author: Zach Ellsworth

customer_reviews.title: Replacement works fine
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this and hooked it up to my PS4. It does not work. However, trying to get it to IT personnel to debug the issue during this time of COVID was hard, so by the time we could determine that it was nothing more than a paperweight, it was past the return window. Do not buy this. UPDATE: Got things fixed. Do buy
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Harkins

customer_reviews.title: comes WITH the needed cord
customer_reviews.text: When Amazon sells you this thing, they give the "often bought with" bit for a cord, implying this thing doesn't have one... It does, you don't need the extra cord, and the one that comes with it is just fine. the system works great and with the size of games these days, plus all the other things you end up doing with the PS4 TV service wise, it's a good investment.
customer_reviews.author: william m. lehman

customer_reviews.title: For Xbox
customer_reviews.text: I got this for use on my Xbox 1 X. I just had to plug it in to a USB port and the Xbox asked me it I wanted to format it. I did and that was all it needed. I now use it for my primary storage of games and movies. It runs just as fast, or maybe faster then the internal HD. Great for extra storage and only 1 wire.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel S.

customer_reviews.title: Some games might have minor issues
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 2TB device for my 500GB PS4. I installed a few games on it and I can say I was very happy playing a few games I haven’t played in a while. It wasn’t until I played Code Vein off of it I noticed audio would skip at the beginning of almost every sentence spoken by a NPC and partner. These audio issues were not present when installed on the PS4 itself. I couldn’t find any information regarding this issue online. So I don’t know if it was a faulty external drive, or Code Vein just doesn’t run right off of it. Don’t want to find other games having issues, so refunded.
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: Impressive, extremely easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up. I bought this for my PS4. PS4 formatted it as soon as I plugged it in. Only took seconds to do. Right after I transferred my biggest games over. Took a few hours cause of the games sizes, but love the space I regained on my console and it even sped up the load up while playing. So far I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Schuch-Blanset

customer_reviews.title: Not recognized.
customer_reviews.text: Mine no longer works. It was purchased December 2018 and only lasted about 6 months. I can’t access it or wipe it,or reformat. Nothing.just says nothing is connected, even though it’s lit up. I have one thing to say in its defense. I travel for work and am home on weekends. Maybe it can’t handle that. But I don’t see any reason why that would/should matter. Another thing is that my kids use the ps4 when I’m home and things like turning off the ps4 correctly completely elude them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Talbert

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool and worth it

customer_reviews.author: LouRevue

customer_reviews.title: After many years using this brand...No problems so far...

I have many of their hard drives I haven't have a problem so far with any of them (finger crossed) :) I have backups of my backups just in case. Really happy with the WB brand if I ever have a problem I'll switch... but its being many many years and no problem what so ever. I do recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Joseph
